meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Normal</kanji> <kanji>work</kanji> is work you do all day long, 8-hours a day, 5 days a week. That is <vocabulary>full time employment</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>full time</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
